short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An elegant art clock with timer and stopwatch. Displays Pixabay artwork to help you manage time and work breaks effectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Art Timer - Elevate Your Time Management

What it does:
• Combines a professional timer with artwork
• Features an elegant clock, countdown timer, and stopwatch
• Automatically refreshes artwork to keep your workspace inspiring
• Supports always-on-top window for easy visibility
• Allows mouse wheel control for quick timer adjustments

Why you'll love it:
• Makes time management visually pleasing and less stressful
• Perfect for technique and work break management
• Helps maintain focus while providing visual inspiration
• Keeps your desktop beautiful and functional

Ideal for professionals, students, artists, or anyone looking to enhance their productivity with an aesthetically pleasing time management tool. Transform your work sessions from mundane to inspiring while staying on track with your schedule.
